```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    print(df.head())
    head_data = df.head()
    
    histogram = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
        x=alt.X('Random Numbers', bin=True), 
        y='count()'
    )
    histogram.save('histogram.png')
    return [head_data, 'histogram.png']

preview_data(data)
```
